title: Handtevy Mobile
description:
Handtevy Mobile is a vital ally for healthcare professionals, offering rapid, precise medication dosing and equipment information critical for emergency care. Designed to support both pediatric and adult patients, and tailored to your guidelines, Handtevy enables comprehensive protocol management and real-time documentation, seamlessly integrated with leading ePCR platforms.

Features such as CPR timers, detailed protocols, and checklists, facilitate decisive actions,  enhancing patient outcomes. CPR Assist aids high-performance teams during cardiac arrests by providing agency-specific timers and audio-visual cues that guide treatment and reassessment.

The addition of Handtevy Connect further streamlines medical communication, ensuring your  contacts and directions are easily accessible. With Handtevy, practitioners have access to powerful, life-saving tools, boosting confidence and precision in every emergency response.

Features such as CPR timers, detailed protocols, and checklists, facilitate decisive actions, enhancing patient outcomes. CPR Assist aids high-performance teams during cardiac arrests by providing agency-specific timers and audio-visual cues that guide treatment and reassessment.

The addition of Handtevy Connect further streamlines medical communication, ensuring your contacts and directions are easily accessible. With Handtevy, practitioners have access to powerful, life-saving tools, boosting confidence and precision in every emergency response.
summary: Rapidly dose and document care for critically ill and injured patients.
